japan.name: Sushi Roll (Maki)
japan.description: Traditional sushi roll with fresh fish and seasoned rice, wrapped in nori seaweed.
instructions: Rinse sushi rice until water runs clear, then cook according to package instructions.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt. Gently fold into warm rice and let cool.
Place nori sheet on bamboo mat, spread rice evenly leaving 1-inch border.
Add thin strips of salmon, cucumber, and avocado in a line.
Roll tightly using bamboo mat, applying gentle pressure.
Wet knife and slice into 8 pieces with sawing motion.
Serve with wasabi, soy sauce, and pickled ginger.
tips: Keep hands wet when handling sushi rice to prevent sticking
Use very sharp knife for clean cuts
Roll away from you with firm, even pressure

japan.name: Chicken Teriyaki
japan.description: Tender chicken glazed with sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, a Japanese-American favorite.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, minced garlic, and ginger for sauce.
Heat oil in large pan over medium-high heat.
Season chicken with salt and pepper, cook skin-side down for 5 minutes.
Flip chicken and cook another 5 minutes until golden.
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken, reduce heat to medium.
Simmer 8-10 minutes until sauce thickens and chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.
tips: Don't move chicken too early - let it develop a golden crust
Sauce should coat the back of a spoon when ready

japan.name: Miso Soup
japan.description: Traditional Japanese soup made with fermented soybean paste, tofu, and wakame seaweed.
instructions: Soak wakame in warm water for 5 minutes until rehydrated.
Cut tofu into small cubes.
Heat dashi stock in a pot over medium heat.
In a small bowl, whisk miso paste with a little warm dashi until smooth.
Add miso mixture back to pot, stir gently.
Add tofu and wakame, heat through without boiling.
Garnish with sliced green onions and serve immediately.
tips: Never boil miso soup as it will kill beneficial probiotics
Dissolve miso paste separately to avoid lumps

italy.name: Pasta Carbonara
italy.description: Classic Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper - no cream needed!
instructions: Bring large pot of salted water to boil for pasta.
Cut pancetta into small cubes and cook in large pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs, egg yolks, and grated cheese in large bowl.
Add generous amount of freshly ground black pepper to egg mixture.
Cook spaghetti until al dente, reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Add hot drained pasta to pan with pancetta off the heat.
Quickly add egg mixture, tossing constantly with pasta water to create silky sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
tips: Remove pan from heat before adding eggs to prevent scrambling
Save pasta water - the starch helps create the creamy sauce
Work quickly once pasta is added to maintain temperature

italy.name: Pizza Margherita
italy.description: The queen of pizzas with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil representing the Italian flag.
instructions: Preheat oven to highest temperature (250¬∞C/480¬∞F) with pizza stone if available.
Let pizza dough come to room temperature for 30 minutes.
Mix crushed tomatoes with minced garlic, salt, and 1 tbsp olive oil.
Stretch dough gently into 12-inch circle on floured surface.
Spread thin layer of tomato sauce, leaving 1-inch border for crust.
Tear mozzarella into chunks and distribute evenly.
Bake 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbling.
Top with fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil before serving.
tips: Less is more - don't overload with toppings
High heat is essential for authentic Neapolitan style
Let dough rest if it springs back while stretching

italy.name: Risotto alla Milanese
italy.description: Creamy saffron risotto from Milan, rich with Parmesan and the golden color of saffron.
instructions: Soak saffron threads in 2 tbsp warm stock.
Heat 30g butter in heavy-bottomed pan, saut√© onion until translucent.
Add rice, stir 2 minutes until grains are coated and lightly toasted.
Pour in wine, stir until absorbed.
Add hot stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Continue for 18-20 minutes until rice is creamy but still al dente.
Stir in saffron mixture, remaining butter, and half the cheese.
Rest 1 minute, then serve with remaining Parmigiano.
tips: Stir constantly to release starch for creaminess
Stock should always be hot when added
Risotto should flow like lava when served

mexico.name: Tacos al Pastor
mexico.description: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, inspired by Lebanese immigrants to Mexico.
instructions: Toast guajillo and chipotle chiles in dry pan until fragrant.
Soak chiles in hot water for 20 minutes until soft.
Blend soaked chiles with garlic, 1/4 onion, orange juice, vinegar, and spices.
Marinate sliced pork in chile mixture for at least 4 hours.
Cook marinated pork in large skillet over high heat until edges crisp.
Grill pineapple slices and dice when charred.
Warm tortillas on comal or dry skillet.
Serve pork on tortillas topped with pineapple, onion, cilantro, and lime.
tips: Slice pork very thin for authentic texture
High heat creates the essential charred edges
Traditional trompo (spit) cooking can be mimicked with a hot grill

mexico.name: Mole Poblano
mexico.description: Complex sauce with over 20 ingredients including chocolate, chiles, and spices - Mexico's national dish.
instructions: Toast chiles in dry pan until fragrant, remove stems and seeds.
Soak toasted chiles in hot chicken broth for 30 minutes.
Separately toast almonds, sesame seeds, and spices until golden.
Char tomatoes and onion on comal until blackened in spots.
Blend chiles with soaking liquid until smooth, strain.
Blend nuts, seeds, spices, tomatoes, onion, and garlic with some broth.
Fry chile mixture in hot lard for 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add nut mixture, cook 15 minutes more.
Add chocolate and thin with chicken broth to sauce consistency.
Simmer cooked chicken in mole for 20 minutes before serving.
tips: Don't burn the chiles - they should smell toasty, not acrid
Mole improves with time - make a day ahead if possible
Traditional recipe uses Mexican chocolate tablets for authentic flavor

mexico.name: Traditional Guacamole
mexico.description: Fresh avocado dip with lime, chilies, and cilantro - a perfect accompaniment to any Mexican meal.
instructions: Cut avocados in half, remove pits, and scoop flesh into large bowl.
Add lime juice immediately to prevent browning.
Mash avocados with fork, leaving some chunks for texture.
Mix in diced onion, jalape√±o, tomato, and garlic.
Fold in chopped cilantro and season with salt.
Taste and adjust lime, salt, and jalape√±o as needed.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or as a taco topping.
tips: Use the 'squeeze test' - ripe avocados yield to gentle pressure
Add lime juice first to prevent oxidation
Save one avocado pit and place in guacamole to slow browning

india.name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
india.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender marinated chicken, invented in Delhi in the 1950s.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, half the garam masala, and ginger-garlic paste for 4+ hours.
Heat 2 tbsp butter in large pan, cook marinated chicken until just done. Set aside.
In same pan, saut√© onions until golden brown.
Add remaining spices, cook 1 minute until fragrant.
Add crushed tomatoes, simmer 15 minutes until thick.
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pan.
Stir in cream and remaining butter.
Add chicken back to sauce, simmer 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with basmati rice or naan.
tips: Don't overcook chicken in first step - it finishes in the sauce
Blend sauce smooth for restaurant-style texture
Adjust cream and spices to taste preference

india.name: Chicken Biryani
india.description: Fragrant layered rice dish with spiced chicken, saffron, and aromatic basmati rice.
instructions: Soak saffron in warm milk. Soak rice for 30 minutes.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for 1 hour.
Cook rice in salted water until 70% done, drain.
Cook marinated chicken until tender, about 25 minutes.
In heavy-bottomed pot, layer half the rice.
Add chicken and its gravy, sprinkle with mint and cilantro.
Top with remaining rice, saffron milk, fried onions, and ghee.
Cover with foil, then tight lid. Cook on high 3 minutes, then low 45 minutes.
Let rest 10 minutes before opening. Gently mix and serve.
tips: Dum cooking (slow steaming) is crucial for authentic flavor
Don't fully cook rice initially - it finishes during dum
Layer carefully to create distinct strata
